content.text:
# Lithuanian Basketball League awards

The Lithuanian Basketball League awards are the 6 annual awards, that are given by the professional Lithuanian Basketball League (LKL), to recognize its teams and players, for their accomplishments.
Team trophies
{| class="wikitable"
!  Award
!  class="unsortable"| Description
!  class="unsortable"| Most recent winner
|-
| LKL Championship || Awarded to the winner of the LKL Finals. || Žalgiris
|-
| Lithuanian Cup || Awarded to the winner of the Lithuanian Cup Finals. || Žalgiris
|}
Individual awards
{|class="wikitable sortable"
!  width="22%" | Award
!  width="55%" class="unsortable"| Description
!  width="20%" class="unsortable"| Most recent winner(s)
|-
| King Mindaugas Cup MVP || Awarded to the best performing player of the annual King Mindaugas Cup ||  Ignas Brazdeikis (Žalgiris)
|-
| LKL Most Valuable Player || Awarded to the best performing player of the regular LKL season, as voted by a panel of sportswriters throughout Lithuania. ||  Anthony Cowan Jr. (Wolves)
|-
| LKL Finals Most Valuable Player || Awarded to the best performing player of the LKL Finals, as voted by a panel of nine media members. ||  Sylvain Francisco (Žalgiris)
|-
|}
LKL Coach of the Year
The LKL Coach of the Year award is given to the best head coach of the full LKL season.
See also
*Basketball in Lithuania
External links
* [http://en.lkl.lt/ Official LKL website]
* [https://www.youtube.com/user/LKLVIDEO Official LKL YouTube.com channel]
* [https://www.eurobasket.com/Lithuania/basketball.aspx Lithuanian league at Eurobasket.com]
